body: Hi Mingbo, Thanks to your imediate reply. Sorry for forgetting to upload gh document. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VQvbBACfG9oaHIRLcUnfuIHr4c6FHxbQ4f6hOTAQ1zuCHq6qO2duo3wnUj7R8k0dlStYXybobuhnM6RugGV79TfSEYPYVVbv/QQ20161103100635.png) I uploaded my gh file this time. As you can see, I used **Set Ep Interior Zone Construction** component to add airwall, but only your operation did work. So is it equal to your operation? Or what's the difference between them? Still, I can't get the surface values this time. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VQvbBACfG9oLo26V76Lzy0-SEB6WC3MGOSvNdNEGz*9HZKi*3lM*6FKsJ7obeGHSaeWIKxdQ7fP0HKRIedrpfIbUkumhsMNh/QQ20161103100647.png)I also saw your illustration in the uploaded gh file, so should I input **boolean toggle**(false) to the **solarDistribution**? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/VQvbBACfG9q04kSCSPUe29irzY20UC2RTB7v8gZ18FWW-wnjTB*Wg81kFTRBqBsQkn90Ko9-Va1tWMdAHBcSJ3H7POsxnMMV/QQ20161103100821.png) Thank you again for your great help, as the design process really did some work for me.
